summary: A woman who has psychic visions returns to her hometown to exorcise her demons, and finds both danger and love.
cast: Claire Forlani|Oliver Hudson|Chad Willett|Jonathan Scarfe|Josie Davis|Jacqueline Bisset|Shaun Johnston|Greg Lawson|Maureen Rooney|Kailin See|Shae Keebler|Gabrielle Casha|Brieanna Moench|Kade Philps|Connor Robinson|Taison Gelinas|Carrie Schiffler|Mark Holmes|Keith White|Dusty Finkbeiner|Chris Emrich
title: Carolina Moon
